title: Flat sub-Lorentzian structures on Martinet distribution
abstract:
Two flat sub-Lorentzian problems on the Martinet distribution are studied.
For the first one, the attainable set has a nontrivial intersection with the
Martinet plane, but for the second one it does not. Attainable sets, optimal
trajectories, sub-Lorentzian distances and spheres are described.
